info.name: Bing - Clean white slate
info.description: Makes for a cleaner Bing. NOTICE: I will no longer be updating this userstyle, because Bing has updated their search results page to be quite similar to what this userstyle makes it look like. Therefore, this userstyle is no longer necessary.
info.additionalInfo:
version 0.1
- cleans up Bing to a pristine white slate.
